original: 方晝則見影不見光，方夜則見方而不見形。其觸物也，驁然而過，隨過隨合，覺疾而不血刃焉。春秋時衛人孔周收藏殷代留下來的三把寶劍之一，與含光、承影齊名。
text: Fang Zhou sees the shadow without seeing the light, Fang Ye sees the square without seeing the light. It touches things too quickly, and goes along with it, feeling sick and not bloody. Kong Zhou, the guardian of the Spring and Autumn Period, collected one of the three swords left over from the Yin Dynasty, which is as famous as Hanguang and Chengying.
